name: solvently
content:
Add to word list

(especially of companies) in a way that shows that you have the ability to pay all the money that is owed to other people or companies: Her simple ambition was to get married, settle down, and live solvently.trade solvently If clubs are not seen to be trading solvently, they could be penalized.
